definition: flour/noodles/(of food) soft (not crunchy)/(slang) (of a person) ineffectual/spineless
face/side/surface/aspect/top/classifier for flat surfaces such as drums, mirrors, flags etc
to catch sight of in a doorway (old)
board/plank/plate/shutter/table tennis bat/clappers (music)/CL:塊|块[kuai4]/accented beat in Chinese music/hard/stiff/to stop smiling or look serious

sentences.english: Most of the panels in a tutorial use this design.
sentences.chinese: 教程中的大多数面板都使用这种设计。

sentences.english: The ribbed aluminium panels on the plinth form a light-coloured band that wraps around the building.
sentences.chinese: 底座上肋骨状的铝面板形成了环绕建筑的浅色带。

sentences.english: You might also want to install a control panel for your graphic card .
sentences.chinese: 您可能还想为您的图形卡安装一个控制面板。

sentences.english: The radio's dial twirled and the lights behind the tuning panel went out.
sentences.chinese: 收音机的调谐钮转动了一下，面板上的指示灯熄灭了。

sentences.english: Both light and temperature, with the addition of wind speed and other factors, can influence panel output.
sentences.chinese: 光和温度，外加风速和其他因素都能影响面板的输出。

sentences.english: The system is controlled from a board fixed next to the chute door.
sentences.chinese: 该系统由垃圾道门口旁边的一个面板来控制。

sentences.english: Extrusion-pattern wall is a new kind of technique in construction of faceplate rock-fill dam.
sentences.chinese: 挤压墙技术是面板堆石坝施工中的新技术。

sentences.english: The 4008 control panel is also contractor-friendly.
sentences.chinese: 该4008型控制面板同时还具有用户友好型特征。

sentences.english: Surface panels applied to carcase or other structural frame.
sentences.chinese: 覆盖在构架或其他框架上的面板。

sentences.english: It has Amaya themes, a style panel for documents and template support.
sentences.chinese: 还有Amaya主题，支持文档和模板的面板风格。

sentences.english: Force start even if scim panel socket can not be established.
sentences.chinese: 强行启动，即使面板服务套接字不能建立。

sentences.english: Front fold-down panel can be secured in different positions for temperature control.
sentences.chinese: 前折向下面板很安全，各个不同方向的温度控制。

sentences.english: The maximum value of shrinkage stress of slabs before water storage increased obviously compared with that in the end of concrete placement.
sentences.chinese: 蓄水前面板干缩应力的峰值较浇筑结束时明显增大。

sentences.english: Ultra padded air mesh back panel with ventilation channels.
sentences.chinese: 超软垫空中网后面板上的通风通道。

sentences.english: This is the only three Chinese enterprises LCD panel.
sentences.chinese: 这是中国仅有的三家液晶面板企业。

sentences.english: Bemo-roof system is used as roof boarding of Huanglong Gymnasium in Zhejiang Province.
sentences.chinese: 浙江省黄龙体育馆的屋面板采用贝姆屋面系统。

definition: button or key (on a device)/keystroke/CL:個|个[ge4]/to press a button
case, casing, cabinet or housing (of a computer, photocopier etc)
